column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////First time visiting and was blown away by the food and service.  They had a dinner special of Chicken Pot Pie. We ordered one and shared it for the table.  It was incredible. They only make a limited number a night so I was glad we got one.  I had the crab cake which was huge and delicious. Also got to try the shrimp cocktail (Exceptional)
column4: elotes (exceptional).  This is my new favorite restaurant in Chicago.  Thank you for a memorable meal.
